sense.gloss: to make a mistake (in), to commit an error, to do incorrectly, to err
to be wrong, to be incorrect, to be false, to be mistaken
to mislead, to misguide, to lead astray

sdata.j: ↑一↑↓いち↓↑歩|↑↓ほ↓↑誤↑↓あやま↓る|とせんじんの↑谷↑↓たに↓だ。
sdata.e: One step further, and you will fall into an abyss.

sdata.j: ↑好奇↑↓こうき↓↑心↑↓しん↓は↑身↑↓み↓を|↑誤↑↓あやま↓る|。
↑多弁↑↓たべん↓の↑人↑↓ひと↓は↑多↑↓おお↓く|↑誤↑↓あやま↓る|。
sdata.e: He that talks much, errs much.

sdata.j: ↑本能↑↓ほんのう↓に↑従↑↓したが↓うと↑道↑↓みち↓を|↑誤↑↓あやま↓る|ことが↑多↑↓おお↓い。
sdata.e: Instinct is often a poor guide.
